metadata.title: CVE-2023-52806 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ALSA:hda: Fix possible null-ptr-deref when assigning a stream While AudioDSPdrivers assign streams exclusively of HOST or LINK type, nothing blocks auser to attempt to assign a COUPLED stream. As supplied substream instancemay be a stub, what is the case when code-loading, such scenario ends withnull-ptr-deref.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
